name: CORE POWER (US) INC.
description: CORE POWER develops nuclear technologies for heavy industry, maritime, and transport.
sampleDescriptions: Support for civil nuclear technologies for heavy industry, maritime, and transportation in the FY 2026 National Defense Authorization Act and several sections of the FY 2026 Appropriations Act.
